text: "Still Swingin" is a song by the American rock band Papa Roach. It was released as the first single from their album "The Connection". It was released on June 24, 2012. The single was well liked by the fans for having the rap-style vocals of the band's early songs. == Chart performance == Chart (2012) Peak position ==References== Category:2012 songs
title: Still Swingin'
